lead_paragraph: Gunmen armed with automatic rifles and pistols stormed a Bahraini prison Sunday, killing a police officer and freeing 10 inmates convicted on terrorism charges, police said.
snippet: Gunmen armed with automatic rifles and pistols stormed a Bahraini prison Sunday, killing a police officer and freeing 10 inmates convicted on terrorism charges, police said....

headline.main: Gunmen Kill Police Officer, Free Inmates at Bahrain Prison
headline.print_headline: Gunmen Kill Police Officer, Free Inmates at Bahrain Prison
